text: @RealJamesWoods I question everything about this virus;  the overreach of authorities on our personal freedoms, ventilators that seem to do more harm than good, counting other deaths as Coronavirus deaths, hospitals that are NOT full with virus victims, medical staff laid off, etc. Lies,lies!
